item.title: Publications
item.description: 2015 Potential of faba bean starch for distilled spirit production Enhancing the economic potential of beans using Vicia faba L.: Crop performance and the use of air-classified grain components in animal feeds and brewing 2015 Potential of faba bean starch for distilled spirit production Authors: G Walker, J Ianieri, M Moench, G Palomba, P Iannetta Abstract: Faba bean (Vicia faba L. minor, also known as field beans) are a grain legume species with great potential in terms of the capacity to improve human and animal nutrition as they are rich in starch, protein and minerals (Fig.
